onyomiExamples.meaning: active duty, active service, student taking (university) entrance exams while still enrolled in school, student who passed their university entrance exams on the first try
incarnation, embodiment, realization, giving concrete form (to)

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to appear, to come in sight, to become visible, to come out, to embody, to materialize, to materialise, to be expressed (e.g. emotions), to become apparent (e.g. trends, effects)
to represent, to signify, to stand for, to reveal, to show, to display, to express, to make widely known
sleep deprivation (as a form of torture)
sleep deprivation (as a form of torture)
